feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 11:52PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...ELEVATED SURF FROM POINT HOPE TO THE BERING STRAIT THROUGH MONDAY... Northwest winds 15 to 30 mph are expected through Monday along the coast south of Point Hope to the Bering Strait, causing elevated surf with minor beach erosion for north facing coastlines.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 7:50PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern La Paz and north central Yuma Counties through 815 PM MST... At 749 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Kofa Wildlife Refuge, or 39 miles northeast of Martinez Lake, moving southeast at 5 mph. entry.summary: ...Abundant Lightning On Dry Fuels Expected Wednesday... .Moisture will begin feeding into the region tomorrow. entry.summary: ...DENSE FOG NEAR LAKE SUPERIOR TONIGHT... Locally dense fog is expected near Lake Superior tonight, from Grand Portage to Duluth, MN to Saxon Harbor, WI. Visibility will be variable from location to location and may be less than 1/4 mile at times.
